title: Can't open Lootboxes
body: I have a box and a key. When I click on the box (Or right click->Open Chest) nothing happens. Also whenever I try to activate any skin shard or reroll, nothing happens.

replies.body: Try refreshing your client. It's most likely happened if you left it open for an extended amount of time and should work after a fresh restart.

Same for me, can't use chests/capsules/orbs :/

https://imgur.com/a/mcE4k

EDIT

Solved by restarting client lol
I had to restart it 4 times, but it did finally work lol
